Summary: looked out the window and seen bright light
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Milford
There were no other sightings in Milford on or around April 22nd 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsi was lying in the bed with my wife on the internet. lately i have been watching news on u.f.o's so i've been very interested in this matter. as we lay there she jokingly says look out the window and when i did i seen a bright light moving side to side at first we thought this just the moon but wife is just so nosy that we had to go outside and see when we did i noticed that the moon was on the other side of the building
